properties.description: Detects when security findings from Coveware by Veeam appear. Security findings indicate potential threats, suspicious activities, or security events that need to be monitored.
properties.query:
VeeamCovewareFindings_CL
| project
    Date = format_datetime(TimeGenerated, 'dd.MM.yyyy HH:mm'),
    CovewareHost = CovewareHostName,
    TargetHostname = Hostname,
    EventType = EventType,
    TechniqueId = TechniqueId,
    EventActivity = EventActivity,
    Username = Username,
    RiskLevel = RiskLevel,
    TenantId = TenantId,
    Artifact = Artifact,
    Country = Country,
    Md5Hash = Md5Hash,
    Sha1Hash = Sha1Hash,
    Sha256Hash = Sha256Hash, 
    EventTime = EventTime
properties.name: Coveware Security Finding Detected
